ModMetaData.name: Gods And Demigods
ModMetaData.author: BigBadE
ModMetaData.description: A WIP mod adding gods to Ideology. REQUIRES IDEOLOGY. Features: - Major and minor deities - Deities now have favor towards pawns - Pawns can earn favor through rituals and sacrifices - Pawns with favor can cast spells - Spreading your ideology strengthens your deities - Special social roles and now associated with the deity - Pawns belief is directly impacted by events - Pawns can pray for miracles, causing positive events and a positive mood - Royalty support (uses honor system instead)
